skill_i.tooltip: Innate: Brand's abilities set his targets ablaze, dealing a percentage of their maximum health in magic damage. This effect may stack up to 3 times, upon which champions and large monsters becomes unstable and detonates in a large area around them dealing massive magic damage.

skill_q.tooltip: Active: Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals magic damage for the first target it hits. If the target is ablaze, the ability will stun the target.

skill_w.tooltip: Active: After a short delay, Brand creates a pillar of flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within. Units that are ablaze take increased damage.

skill_e.tooltip: Active: Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing magic damage to them and all enemies near them. If the target is ablaze, the blast spreads twice as far.

skill_r.tooltip: Active: Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing magic damage each time it bounces, up to 4 bounces. If a target is ablaze, the ability will briefly slow them.
